channel.title: Shop problems
channel.description:
Hey guys I have been making shops for the first time now (I've been coding for ages Its just that I never came across needing shops)
When I finish it and it trades the shops it doesnt work...When it trades it doesnt do anything let me post my codes btw its an axe store:
heres what I have in autospawn.cfg [code]spawn = 524 2542 3878 0 0 0 0 0 1 Axe store[/code] It looks screwed up cos mopar codes screw it up.
Heres my wanneshops in client.java [code] } else if (NPCID == 524) { // Wc shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 68; // Wc shop [/code]
Heres my shop.cfg code (also looks fucked up) [code]shop = 68 WC_SHOP 2 2 1359 100 1357 100 1355 100 1361 100 1353 100 1349 1353 1349 100 1351 100[/code]
If anyone could tell me whats wrong with it...you'd own

item.title: Shop problems
item.dc:creator: @java_is_my_bitch1 java is my bitch.
item.description:
@java_is_my_bitch1 wrote:

[quote=“Goodoo dolls, post:11, topic:250985”]It really makes no sense how this doesn’t work… Everything is coded 100% correct. Try with another npc maybe that will help?[/quote]alredi tryed it…I’ll try it one last time…thanks for all the help Rep++

item.title: Shop problems
item.dc:creator: @Goodoo_dolls Goodoo dolls
item.description:
@Goodoo_dolls wrote:

Thats everything in your shops Cfg? Also Make sure everything is tabbed out one tab. So it would be Shopid[tab] name[tab] buy[tab] sell[tab] itemid[tab] ammount[tab] ect.

//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--

shop = 1 @red@Junk 1 1 1215 10 1231 10 1305 10 1377 10 1434 10 1704 10 4587 10 5698 10 3105 10 1333 10 1052 10 6568 10 3486 10 3483 10 3481 10 1127 20 1093 20 1079 20 1163 20 892 5000 4212 10 4214 10 2581 5 2577 5 861 10 859 10 2552 50 1712 50 6617 50 6619 50 6621 50 6623 50 6625 50 6629 50 6631 50 6633 50

item.description:
@java_is_my_bitch1 wrote:

Hey guys I have been making shops for the first time now (I’ve been coding for ages Its just that I never came across needing shops)

When I finish it and it trades the shops it doesnt work…When it trades it doesnt do anything let me post my codes btw its an axe store:

heres what I have in autospawn.cfg

spawn = 524	2542	3878	0	0	0	0	0	1	Axe store

It looks screwed up cos mopar codes screw it up.

Heres my wanneshops in client.java

} else if (NPCID == 524) { // Wc shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 68; // Wc shop

Heres my shop.cfg code (also looks fucked up)

shop = 68	WC_SHOP				2	2	1359	100	1357	100	1355	100	1361	100	1353	100	1349	1353	1349	100	1351	100

If anyone could tell me whats wrong with it…you’d own
